translation: How long will it be before he attains supreme perfect enlightenment?

source_sentence: 答言：「善男子！

source_sentence: 菩薩不為教化調伏一眾生故發菩提心，不為教化調伏百眾生故發菩提心，
translation: Enlightening beings do not develop the determination for enlightenment just to teach and tame one sentient being; they do not develop the determination for enlightenment just to teach and tame a hundred sentient beings.

source_sentence: 不為教化調伏千眾生故發菩提心，不為教化調伏百千眾生故發菩提心，
translation: They do not develop the will for enlightenment just to teach and tame a thousand sentient beings; they do not develop the will for enlightenment just to teach and tame hundreds of thousands of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 乃至不為教化調伏不可說不可說轉眾生故發菩提心，不為教化成熟一世界眾生故發菩提心，
translation: They do not conceive the determination for enlightenment to teach and tame untold numbers of sentient beings, and they do not conceive the determination for enlightenment to develop all living beings in one world.

source_sentence: 乃至不為教化成熟不可說不可說轉世界眾生故發菩提心，不為教化成熟一閻浮提極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心，
translation: They do not conceive the determination for enlightenment in order to teach and develop sentient beings of untold numbers of worlds; they do not conceive the determination for enlightenment in order to lead and inspire sentient beings of as many buddha-fields as atoms in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 不為成熟一四天下極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心，不為成熟小千世界極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心，
translation: They do not develop the will for enlightenment in order to mature as many sentient beings as atoms in a world, and they do not develop the will for enlightenment in order to mature as many sentient beings as atoms in a thousand worlds.

source_sentence: 不為成熟中千世界極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心，不為成熟三千大千世界極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心，
translation: They do not develop the determination for enlightenment to mature beings in as many worlds as atoms in a thousand buddha-fields, and they do not develop the determination for enlightenment to mature beings in as many worlds as atoms in a thousand buddha-fields.

source_sentence: 乃至不為教化成熟不可說不可說轉三千大千世界極微塵數世界眾生故發菩提心。
translation: It's because they don't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of teaching, transforming, and ripening untold numbers of sentient beings in the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds that are extremely dusty worlds.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為親近供養一如來故發菩提心，乃至不為親近供養不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數諸如來故發菩提心，
translation: “Furthermore, enlightening beings develop the determination for enlightenment because they don’t become intimate with and honor one buddha; they don’t even become intimate with and honor as many buddhas as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 不為親近供養一世界中盡未來劫次第興世諸如來故發菩提心，乃至不為親近供養不可說不可說轉世界中盡未來劫次第興世諸如來故發菩提心，
translation: They do not conceive the determination for enlightenment because they attend and honor all the buddhas of the ten directions in one world; they do not conceive the determination for enlightenment because they attend and honor all the buddhas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 不為親近供養一佛剎極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第興世諸如來故發菩提心，
translation: They do not conceive the determination for enlightenment to become intimate with and honor buddhas in as many worlds as atoms in one buddha-field.

source_sentence: 乃至不為親近供養不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第興世諸如來故發菩提心。
translation: He doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment because he doesn't become intimate with and offer support to the ineffable, untold numbers of buddha-lands that are transformed into worlds as numerous as atoms in an infinite number of worlds.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為嚴淨一世界故發菩提心，乃至不為嚴淨不可說不可說轉世界故發菩提心，
translation: “Furthermore, enlightening beings do not develop the determination for enlightenment because they don’t purify a single world, or even because they don’t develop the determination for enlightenment because they don’t purify as many worlds as atoms in ten directions.

source_sentence: 不為嚴淨一佛剎極微塵數世界故發菩提心，乃至不為嚴淨不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數世界故發菩提心。
translation: They don't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of adorning as many worlds as atoms in a single buddha-field, and they don't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of adorning as many worlds as atoms in an untold number of buddha-fields.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為受持一如來教故發菩提心，乃至不為受持不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數如來教故發菩提心。
translation: Furthermore, the bodhisattva doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of upholding a single Tathāgata's teaching, and he doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of upholding the teachings of as many tathāgatas as there are atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為修習一如來願故發菩提心，乃至不為修習不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數如來願故發菩提心。
translation: Furthermore, the bodhisattva doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of cultivating the vow of a single Tathāgata, and he doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of cultivating the vows of as many tathāgatas as there are atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為往一佛剎故發菩提心，乃至不為往不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數諸佛剎故發菩提心。
translation: Furthermore, the bodhisattva doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of going to one buddha-stage, and he doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of going to as many buddha-lands as there are atoms in untold numbers of buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為莊嚴一如來眾會故發菩提心，乃至不為莊嚴不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數如來眾會故發菩提心。
translation: Furthermore, the bodhisattva doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of adorning the assembly of one tathāgata, and he doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of adorning the assembly of as many tathāgatas as there are atoms in an untold number of buddha-

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為受持一佛所轉妙法輪故發菩提心，乃至不為受持不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數如來所轉妙法輪故發菩提心。
translation: Furthermore, the bodhisattva doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of maintaining the marvelous Dharma wheel turned by a single Buddha, and he doesn't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of maintaining the marvelous Dharma wheel turned by buddhas as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 復次，菩薩不為住持一如來遺法故發菩提心，乃至不為住持不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數如來遺法故發菩提心，
translation: “Furthermore, enlightening beings do not develop the determination for enlightenment just to preserve the teachings of one buddha; they do not develop the determination for enlightenment just to preserve the teachings of as many buddhas as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 不為住持一世界中盡未來劫次第出現如來遺法故發菩提心，乃至不為住持不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第出現如來遺法故發菩提心，
translation: They do not give rise to the determination for enlightenment because they abide in one world and will successively manifest all the teachings of buddhas throughout future ages; they do not give rise to the determination for enlightenment because they abide in as many worlds as atoms in untold numbers of evolving buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 不為住持一閻浮提極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第出現如來遺法故發菩提心，
translation: They do not give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment because they abide in worlds as numerous as atoms in one continent of Jambudvfpa, which will successively manifest buddha-teachings throughout all future ages.

source_sentence: 不為住持一四天下極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第出現如來遺法故發菩提心，
translation: They do not give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment because they abide in worlds as numerous as atoms in one of the four continents.

source_sentence: 乃至不為住持不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數世界中盡未來劫次第出現如來遺法故發菩提心；
translation: They do not develop the determination for enlightenment because they abide in untold buddha-lands, which are as numerous as atoms in countless buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 如是略說不為滿一佛誓願故，不為往一佛國土故，不為入一佛眾會故，
translation: “In this way I explain briefly, not wishing to fulfill the vow of one buddha; not wishing to go to another buddha-land; not wishing to enter a congregation of one buddha.

source_sentence: 不為持一佛法眼故，不為轉一佛法輪故，不為知一世界中諸劫次第故，
translation: It is not to preserve the eye of enlightenment of one buddha; it is not to turn the wheel of teaching of one buddha; it is not to know the succession of eons in one world.

source_sentence: 不為知一眾生種種心海故，不為知一眾生種種根海故，不為知一眾生種種業海故，
translation: They don’t know the various oceans of minds of one sentient being; they don’t know the various oceans of faculties of one sentient being; they don’t know the various oceans of actions of one sentient being.

source_sentence: 不為知一眾生種種行海故，不為知一眾生種種煩惱海故，不為知一眾生種種煩惱習氣海故，
translation: They don’t want to know the ocean of various practices of one sentient being; they don’t want to know the ocean of various afflictions of one sentient being; they don’t want to know the ocean of various afflictive habit energy of one sentient being.

source_sentence: 乃至不為知不可說不可說轉佛剎極微塵數眾生種種煩惱習氣海故發菩提心。
translation: It's because they don't give rise to the mind of enlightenment for the sake of knowing the ocean of various afflictive karmic impressions of sentient beings as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 菩薩為欲教化調伏一切眾生悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: Enlightening beings develop the will for enlightenment because they want to teach and tame all sentient beings without exception.

source_sentence: 為欲親近供養一切諸佛悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop the determination for enlightenment because they want to become intimate with and honor all buddhas without exception.

source_sentence: 為欲嚴淨一切諸佛，所有剎土悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They develop the will for enlightenment because they want to adorn and purify all buddha-lands in all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 為欲守護一切佛教悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They develop the will for enlightenment because they want to preserve all Buddhist teachings without exception.

source_sentence: 為欲隨順一切如來所行之道悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They develop the will for enlightenment because they want to follow the paths practiced by all buddhas without exception.

source_sentence: 為欲成滿一切如來廣大誓願悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They develop the will for enlightenment because they want to fulfill the vast vows of all buddhas, without exception.

source_sentence: 欲往一切諸佛國土悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to go to all buddha-lands without remainder, so they develop the will for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲入一切諸佛眾會悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to enter the assemblies of all buddhas without exception, so they develop the determination for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲知一切諸世界中諸劫次第悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to know the succession of eons in all worlds without remainder, so they set their minds on enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲知一切眾生心海悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to know that the ocean of minds of all sentient beings has no remainder, so they develop determination for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲知一切眾生根海悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to know that the ocean of faculties of all sentient beings has no remainder, so they arouse the determination for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲知一切眾生業海悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to know that the ocean of actions of all sentient beings has no remainder, so they develop determination for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲知一切眾生行海悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to know that the ocean of all sentient beings’ practices has no remainder, so they set their minds on enlightenment.

source_sentence: 欲滅一切眾生諸煩惱海悉無餘故發菩提心；
translation: They want to extinguish the ocean of afflictions of all sentient beings and give rise to determination for enlightenment because there is no remainder.

source_sentence: 欲拔一切眾生煩惱習氣海悉無餘故發菩提心。
translation: They want to remove the ocean of afflictive karmic impressions of all sentient beings without remainder, so they give rise to the mind of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 取要言之：菩薩以如是等百萬阿僧祇方便行故發菩提心。
translation: To summarize, it's because of these millions of incalculable skillful practices that bodhisattvas give rise to the mind of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 菩薩行普入一切法皆證得故；
translation: The practice of enlightening beings enters into all things and realizes them.

source_sentence: 普入一切剎悉嚴淨故。
translation: It's because they universally enter all the buddha-lands and are completely adorned and pure.

source_sentence: 是故，善男子！
translation: Therefore, good man!

source_sentence: 嚴淨一切世界盡我願乃盡，悉知十方一切世界劫次第盡我願乃盡，悉得十方一切諸佛功德海盡我願乃盡，
translation: He adorned and purified all worlds, fulfilling my vows as soon as I had exhausted them; he knew the succession of all world ages in the ten directions. As soon as his vows were exhausted, he attained the consummation of all oceans of virtues of buddhas everywhere.

source_sentence: 次第修集一切菩薩精進海盡我願乃盡，莊嚴十方一切諸佛眾會海盡我願乃盡，
translation: When the ocean of all enlightening beings’ oceans of virtues is exhausted, my vows are fulfilled; when the ocean of assemblies of buddhas in the ten directions is exhausted, my vows are fulfilled.

source_sentence: 悉見十方一切眾生心樂海盡我願乃盡，悉知十方一切眾生根器海盡我願乃盡，
translation: They see all the oceans of aspirations of all sentient beings in the ten directions, and then their vows are fulfilled; they know all the oceans of faculties and vessels of all sentient beings in the ten directions, and when their vows are fulfilled, their vows are fulfilled.

source_sentence: 普觀十方一切眾生諸行海盡我願乃盡，普竭十方一切眾生惑業海盡我願乃盡，
translation: As soon as my vows were exhausted, the ocean of practices of all sentient beings in the ten directions ceased; and as soon as the ocean of delusions and actions of all sentient beings in the ten directions were exhausted, my vows were ended.

source_sentence: 悉滅十方一切眾生眾苦海盡我願乃盡，悉拔十方一切眾生習氣海盡我願乃盡。
translation: They completely extinguish the ocean of sufferings of all sentient beings in the ten directions and then end my wishes, and they completely remove the ocean of the habit energy of all sentient beings in the ten directions and end my wishes.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 如是乃至百千萬億阿僧祇菩薩行門，皆悉圓滿，悉無餘故我願乃滿。
translation: Thus, up to a hundred thousand myriad of koṭis of incalculable bodhisattva practices are all perfected, and there's nothing left; therefore, my vow is fulfilled.

source_sentence: 是故，菩薩為欲成滿一切智故，為欲隨順菩薩行故，為欲嚴淨一切剎故，
translation: Because they want to perfect omniscience, because they want to follow the practices of enlightening beings, and because they want to purify all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 於一切法勇猛勤求無有懈息。
translation: He's courageous and diligent in seeking all the teachings without laziness.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 應知菩薩發菩提心所修行願，所有志樂，廣大如法界究竟如虛空；
translation: “Great enlightening beings should know that the aspiration for enlightenment developed by the determination for enlightenment is as vast as space in the cosmos of reality and endless as space.

source_sentence: 虛空究竟無窮盡故，我願究竟亦無有盡；
translation: Because space ultimately has no end, my vows ultimately also have no end.

source_sentence: 法界廣大無邊際故，我願廣大亦無邊際；
translation: Because the realm of reality is vast and boundless, my vows are also vast and boundless.

source_sentence: 諸眾生界究竟無盡故，我願究竟亦無有盡。」
translation: Because the realm of sentient beings is ultimately inexhaustible, my vows are ultimately inexhaustible.

source_sentence: 善財童子白言：「聖者！
translation: The boy of good fortune said, Sage!

source_sentence: 此解脫門名為何等？」
translation: What's the name of this gate of liberation?

source_sentence: 伊舍那言：「善男子！
translation: Īśāna said, Good man!

source_sentence: 此解脫名離憂安隱幢。
translation: This liberation is called the peaceful banner of freedom from sorrow.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此一解脫門，如諸菩薩摩訶薩樂欲深廣，猶如大海，容受佛法心無厭足；
translation: “I only know this one door of liberation, which is like the depth and breadth of great enlightening beings’ aspirations for enlightenment, like a great ocean that allows them to receive the buddha-teachings without tire.

source_sentence: 志意堅固如須彌山，所修正行不可傾動；
translation: Their determination was as firm as the polar mountain, unshakable in what they practiced.

source_sentence: 所作不空，如善見藥能除眾生煩惱重病；
translation: What they do is not in vain, like the medicine of good views able to remove the afflictions and serious illnesses of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 無礙慧身如明淨日滅諸眾生無明闇障；
translation: The body of unobstructed wisdom is like the clear sun, extinguishing the darkness of ignorance of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 無盡大悲，猶如大地普作一切眾生所依；
translation: Inexhaustible great compassion is like the earth that serves as a refuge for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 福智功德猶如好風，與諸眾生作大義利；
translation: The merit of virtue and knowledge is like a good wind that brings great benefit to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 普照世間猶如燈燭，能生一切智慧光明；
translation: It illumines all worlds like a candle, able to produce the light of omniscience.

source_sentence: 普現其身猶如大雲，能與眾生雨寂滅法；
translation: They manifested their bodies everywhere like great clouds, able to shower sentient beings with the tranquil teaching of extinction.

source_sentence: 福德光明猶如滿月，能令見者咸得安樂；
translation: The light of blessedness and virtue is like the full moon, enabling those who see it to attain peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 威德尊勝猶如帝釋，悉能守護一切眾生，而我云何能知、能說彼諸菩薩難思戒、定無邊法海功德行願？
translation: How can I know or tell of the inconceivable virtues and vows of those bodhisattvas who practice the inconceivable precepts, concentrate on the boundless ocean of truth?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於此南方海潮之處，有一國土名那羅素，中有仙人名大威猛聲；
translation: To the south of here, at the place where the sea was high and tideful, there was a land called Nārasu in which lived an immortal named Mahasamghika.

source_sentence: 汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行，修菩薩道。」
translation: Go there and ask the bodhisattva how to train in the bodhisattva practice and cultivate the bodhisattva path.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子禮伊舍那優婆夷足，遶無數匝，慇懃瞻仰，悲泣流淚，作是思惟：「善知識者難可出現，
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the layman Anāthapiṇḍika and said, “It is difficult for a good friend to appear before me.

source_sentence: 如優曇華；
translation: It is like the udumbara flower.

source_sentence: 善知識者最極難值，善知識者難得親近，善知識者難得承事，善知識者難令歡喜。」
translation: A good teacher is the most difficult to meet, a good teacher is difficult to get close to, a good teacher is difficult to serve, and a good teacher is difficult to make joyous.

source_sentence: 復作是念：「得菩提難，得菩薩諸根難，淨菩薩諸根難，值同行善知識難，
translation: Again, he thought, “There’s a difficulty in attaining enlightenment, a difficulty in acquiring the bodhisattva’s faculties, a difficulty in purifying the bodhisattva’s faculties, and a difficulty in meeting spiritual benefactors who are fellow practitioners.

source_sentence: 積集菩薩廣大善根難，寂靜菩薩廣大境界難，如理觀察菩薩行願難，隨順思惟菩薩教法難，
translation: The difficulty of accumulating the vast roots of goodness of enlightening beings, the difficulty of the vast sphere of tranquility of enlightening beings, the difficulty of correctly observing the practices and vows of enlightening beings, the difficulty of contemplating the teachings of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 依教修行菩薩妙行難，憶念出生菩薩善心難，速疾發起菩薩方便難，善巧增長一切智法光明難。」
translation: Relying on the teaching to cultivate the difficulty of the bodhisattva's marvelous practice, he remembers the difficulty of producing a bodhisattva's good mind, quickly arouses the difficulty of the bodhisattva's skillful means, and skillfully increases the difficulty of the light of the Dharma of omniscience.

source_sentence: 作是念已，辭退而去。
translation: After he had this thought, he withdrew and departed.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子隨順思惟菩薩正教，隨順思惟菩薩淨行，起速疾增長一切菩薩福力心，
translation: “At that time Sudhana, contemplating the practice of enlightening beings and reflecting on the virtues of enlightening beings, conceived the aspiration for enlightenment to develop all buddha-teachings.

source_sentence: 起速疾普見一切諸佛光明心，起速疾獲得一切法藏心，起速疾增長一切大願心，
translation: They develop a mind to quickly see the light of all buddhas, a mind to quickly attain the treasury of all teachings, and a mind to quickly increase all great vows.

source_sentence: 起速疾現見十方諸法心，起速疾明照諸法本性心，起速疾散滅一切障礙心，
translation: They give rise to the mind that quickly sees all things in the ten directions; they give rise to the mind that quickly clarifies the original nature of all things; they give rise to the mind that quickly dispels all obstructions.

source_sentence: 起速疾觀察法界無闇心，起速疾能壞內垢金剛心，起速疾摧伏魔王軍眾心，
translation: They develop a mind to quickly observe the absence of darkness in the realm of reality, a mind to quickly destroy the internally defiled adamantine minds, and a mind to quickly subdue the armies of Māra King.

source_sentence: 起速疾清淨意寶莊嚴心。
translation: He gives rise to a mind that quickly and purely adorns the jeweled treasure of intention.

source_sentence: 如是思惟，漸漸遊行至那羅素國，周遍尋求大威猛仙，見一大林其林蓊欝，
translation: Having thought in this way, he gradually traveled to the country of Nārasu and searched everywhere for the Great Majestic Sage. He saw a big forest with trees growing on it.

source_sentence: 阿僧祇樹以為莊嚴。
translation: An incalculable number of trees adorn it.

source_sentence: 所謂：種種葉樹枝條扶踈，密葉葱翠；
translation: Various kinds of leaves, branches, leaves, and trees provide shade; dense leaves are resplendent.

source_sentence: 種種華樹，柯葉布濩，繁華鮮美；
translation: There are various kinds of flowering trees, with luxuriant fragrant leaves spreading over the ground and abundant flowers that are exquisitely colorful.

source_sentence: 種種果樹，相續成熟；
translation: Various kinds of fruit-bearing trees continued to grow in succession.

source_sentence: 種種寶樹，雨摩尼果；
translation: Various kinds of precious trees rained crystal fruits.

source_sentence: 大栴檀樹處處行列；
translation: Everywhere the great sandalwood trees lined up in rows.

source_sentence: 諸沈水樹常出好香；
translation: The water-soiled trees always produce good fragrance.

source_sentence: 閻浮檀樹恒雨甘果；
translation: The Jambudvipa trees always shower sweet fruit.

source_sentence: 悅意香樹妙香莊嚴；
translation: Delightful fragrant trees adorned themselves with exquisitely fragrant ornaments.

source_sentence: 波吒羅樹其華鮮榮，香氣芬馥四面圍遶；
translation: The flowers of the paṭala trees grew luxuriantly and their fragrant odors surrounded the four sides.

source_sentence: 尼拘陀樹其身聳擢，枝葉繁布，盤旋如蓋；
translation: The nyagrodha tree grows tall, with luxuriant branches and leaves spreading in abundance, swirling like canopies.

source_sentence: 優鉢羅華、波頭摩華、拘物頭華、芬陀利華處處開敷，以嚴池沼。
translation: Upāla flowers, padma flowers, kumuda flowers, and puṇḍarīka flowers bloomed everywhere to adorn the ponds and marshes.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子入此大林，見栴檀樹其身洪直，枝條垂布，華葉繁密，偃蓋成蔭。
translation: Then Sudhana entered this great forest and saw the sandalwood tree, which was large and straightforward in body with branches and leaves spreading down like clouds. The flowers and leaves were so numerous that they covered the canopy to provide shade.

source_sentence: 時，彼仙人在此樹下縈髮為髻，藉以香草；
translation: At that time the holy man was lying under a tree, wrapped his hair around his neck and covered it with scented grass.

source_sentence: 十千仙眾，前後圍遶。
translation: Ten thousand holy ones surrounded the stupa in front and behind it.

source_sentence: 其諸仙人，或衣鹿皮，或衣樹皮，或編細草種種衣服，髻環垂鬢，瞻仰而住。
translation: The holy ones wore robes made of deer hide and other kinds of cloth, as well as those made of tree bark or cotton cloth. They wore silk clothes with hair hanging down their necks in a circle on the topknot; they stood there gazing respectfully.

source_sentence: 善財見已，往詣其所，五體投地，深心頂禮，作如是言：「我今得遇真善知識。」
translation: Seeing this, Sun Cai went to him, prostrated himself on the ground with five bodies, paid his respects, and said, Now, I've met a truly good teacher.

source_sentence: 復作是念：「善知識者則是趣向一切智門，令我得入真實道故；
translation: Again, he thought: A good friend is the gate leading to omniscience, enabling me to enter the path of reality.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智乘，令我得至如來地故；
translation: A good friend is someone who proceeds toward the vehicle of omniscience, enabling me to reach buddhahood.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智船，令我得至智寶洲故；
translation: Good friend is the way to proceed on the ship of omniscience, enabling me to reach the most precious island of knowledge.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智炬，令我得生十力光故；
translation: A good friend is the torch of omniscience directed toward all, enabling me to produce the light of my ten powers.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智道，令我速入涅槃城故；
translation: A good friend is someone who proceeds on the path of omniscience, causing me to quickly enter the city of nirvana.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智燈，令我得辨邪正路故；
translation: A good friend is the lamp that leads to omniscience, enabling me to discern the right path of what is wrong.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智橋，令我得度生死流故；
translation: A good friend is a bridge leading to omniscience, enabling me to cross the stream of birth and death.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智蓋，令我獲得慈悲蔭故；
translation: A good friend is the hood of omniscience directed toward all, enabling me to attain the shade of compassion.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智津，令我速達功德岸故；
translation: A good friend is a river of all knowledge leading to omniscience, enabling me to quickly reach the shore of virtue.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智眼，令我得見法性門故；
translation: A good friend is the eye of omniscience directed toward all, enabling me to attain insight into the essential nature of things.

source_sentence: 善知識者則是趣向一切智潮，令我應限不失時故。」
translation: A good teacher is someone who's headed toward the tide of omniscience and causes me to do so at the right time without losing it.

source_sentence: 作是語已，從地而起，遶無量匝，合掌前立，白言：「聖者！
translation: After he said this, he rose from the ground, circumambulated him boundless times, joined his palms and stood in front of him, and said, Sage!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何學菩薩行、云何修菩薩道，
translation: I have set my mind on unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, but I do not know how an enlightening being is to learn and carry out the practice of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 我聞聖者善能誘誨，願為我說。」
translation: I've heard that the noble one is good at encouraging, so please tell me about it.

source_sentence: 時，彼仙人顧眄仙眾而告之言：「諸仁！
translation: The sage then looked at the holy monks and said to them, Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 當知此童子已發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，此童子欲施一切眾生無畏，此童子欲與一切眾生利益，
translation: You should know that this boy has set his mind on unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, that this boy wants to give all sentient beings fearlessness and that this boy wants to benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 此童子欲惠一切眾生安樂，此童子欲觀一切諸佛智海，此童子欲蔭一切如來法雲，
translation: In order to bring peace and happiness to all sentient beings, this boy wants to see the ocean of knowledge of all buddhas. This boy wants to illuminate the cloud of teachings of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 此童子欲遊一切諸佛教海，此童子欲然一切大智明燈，此童子欲起一切大慈悲雲，
translation: This boy wants to travel in the ocean of all buddha-teachings, this boy wants to light up the lamp of knowledge of all great knowledges, and this boy wants to produce clouds of all great compassion.

source_sentence: 此童子欲飲一切甘露法水，此童子欲雨一切廣大法雨，此童子欲以智月普照世間，
translation: This boy wants to drink all the water of the ambrosia of the Teaching, and this boy wants to rain down all the vast rain of the Teaching.

source_sentence: 此童子欲滅眾生煩惱毒熱，此童子欲施世間善法清涼，此童子欲長含識一切善根。」
translation: This boy wants to extinguish the poisonous fever of afflictions in sentient beings, this boy wants to give the world good qualities that are pure and cool, and this boy wants to long contain all the good roots of consciousness.

source_sentence: 時諸仙眾聞是語已，各以種種上妙香華散善財上，布身作禮，遶無量匝，
translation: When the holy ones heard these words, they each scattered various kinds of exquisitely fragrant flowers over Sudhana, covered their bodies, and circumambulated him countless times.

source_sentence: 稱揚讚歎，作如是言：「今此童子必能救護一切眾生，必能除滅諸地獄苦，
translation: They extolled and praised him, saying, “This prince will surely save all sentient beings. He will surely be able to remove the suffering of hell.

source_sentence: 必能永斷諸畜生趣，必能永離閻羅王界，必能關閉諸難處門，必能乾竭諸愛欲海，
translation: They will surely be able to cut off the rebirths of animals forever, they will surely be able to leave the realm of Yama forever, they will surely be able to close the doors of difficulties, they will surely be able to dry up the ocean of cravings and desires.

source_sentence: 必能解脫貪欲纏縛，必能永滅眾生苦蘊，必能永破無明黑闇，必以福德大輪圍山周護世間令其安樂，
translation: They will surely be able to liberate beings from the bondage of craving, they will surely be able to permanently extinguish the mass of suffering in sentient beings, they will surely be able to forever destroy the darkness of ignorance, and they will surely surround the world with great mountains of virtue.

source_sentence: 必以智慧大寶須彌顯示世間功德智聚，必以清淨無礙智日開示一切善根法藏，
translation: They must show the worldly cluster of knowledge of virtue by means of the great jewel of knowledge of wisdom. They must reveal all the stores of doctrine of roots of goodness by means of pure, unhindered knowledge.

source_sentence: 必令眾生開淨智眼明識世間歸於正道。」
translation: It will surely cause sentient beings to open the pure eye of wisdom and insight and consciousness in the world to return to the right path.

source_sentence: 時，大威猛聲告群仙言：「善男子！
translation: The great majestic voice then addressed the sages, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 若有能發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，必能勇猛行菩薩行，必能饒益一切眾生，
translation: If someone can give rise to the determination for unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, they must be able to courageously practice the deeds of enlightening beings and must be able to benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 必與眾生廣大利樂，必能成就一切智道。
translation: They must give sentient beings vast benefits and pleasures, and they must be able to accomplish the path of omniscience.

source_sentence: 此善男子已發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，當淨一切佛功德地。」
translation: This good man has aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, which will purify the ground of the merits of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 說是語已，告善財言：「善男子！
translation: After speaking these words, he told Shanzai, Good man!

source_sentence: 我得菩薩無勝幢解脫門。」
translation: I've attained the liberation gate of the bodhisattva's unsurpassed banner.

source_sentence: 善財白言：「聖者！
translation: Shanzai said, Sage!

source_sentence: 此解脫門境界云何？」
translation: What's the sphere of this gate of liberation?

source_sentence: 時彼大仙即伸右手摩善財頂、執善財手；
translation: The great sage then extended his right hand to the top of Shanzai’s head and held Shanzai’s hand.

source_sentence: 即時善財自見其身，普往十方百千佛剎極微塵數諸世界中，普詣十方百千佛剎極微塵數諸如來所，
translation: Sudhana saw Sudhana go to as many buddha-fields in the ten directions as atoms in countless buddha-lands, seeing as many buddhas everywhere as atoms in countless buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 見彼佛剎及其眾會種種莊嚴，亦見彼佛種種相好光明熾盛，亦聞彼佛隨諸眾生心之所樂而演說法。
translation: Seeing the various adornments of those buddha-lands and their congregations, they also see that Buddha's various features and brilliant light blazing brightly, and they hear that Buddha teach the Dharma according to the desires of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 一文一句皆悉通達，各別領受諸佛法輪，各別記持開發義理，前後次第無有雜亂。
translation: Each text and one phrase are fully comprehended, each individually receiving the Dharma wheels of the buddhas, each individually remembering and developing their meanings and principles, and there's no confusion before or after them.

source_sentence: 亦知彼佛所度眾生，種種樂欲隨其根性，雨諸法雨各得成熟；
translation: They also know the various pleasures and inclinations of those sentient beings liberated by those buddhas; according to their faculties and capacities, they shower rain of all truths and each attain maturity.

source_sentence: 亦知彼佛於往昔時，以種種解，淨諸願海；
translation: They also know that in the past those buddhas purified oceans of vows with various understandings.

source_sentence: 亦知彼佛以清淨願，成就諸力；
translation: They also know the powers of those buddhas’ pure vows.

source_sentence: 亦見彼佛隨眾生心，所現種種差別色身；
translation: They also saw those buddhas manifest various different physical forms according to the mentalities of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 亦見彼佛大光明網，種種色相圓滿清淨；
translation: They also saw the network of great lights of those buddhas, their various forms and characteristics perfectly pure.

source_sentence: 亦知彼佛無障礙智，道場眾會清淨莊嚴；
translation: They also know the unobstructed knowledge of those buddhas, the pure adornments of the congregations at their sites of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 又自見身普於一切諸如來所，親近供養受持正法，或於佛所一日一夜，
translation: They also saw their bodies everywhere in the presence of all buddhas, attending and honoring those buddhas to preserve the Teaching for a day and night.

source_sentence: 或於佛所七日七夜，或經半月，或經一月、一年、十年、百年、千年，
translation: They may stay with the Buddha for seven days and nights, or for a fortnight, or for a month, a year, a decade, a hundred years, or a thousand years.

source_sentence: 或百千年，或經億年、百億、千億、百千億年，或阿庾多億年，或那由他億年，
translation: It may be one hundred thousand years, or it may pass for a hundred million years, a trillion years, a quadrillion years, a trichiliocosm, or ten-thousandths of a trichiliocosm.

source_sentence: 或經半劫，或經一劫、百劫、千劫，或百千億阿庾多那由他億劫，乃至不可說不可說佛剎極微塵數劫，
translation: It may go on for half an eon, sometimes for an eon, sometimes for a hundred eons, sometimes for a thousand eons, sometimes for millions of billions of eons, up to as many eons as atoms in untold numbers of buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 如是一切咸悉了知無不通達。
translation: All of these things are completely known and comprehended without fail.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子為菩薩無勝幢解脫智光明照故，得毘盧遮那藏三昧光明；
translation: At that time the enlightening being Universally Good, illumined by the light of the knowledge of liberation called “unsurpassed Banner,” attained the illumination of unfathomable knowledge.

source_sentence: 為無盡智解脫三昧光明照故，得普攝諸方，現諸方身陀羅尼光明；
translation: Because the light of the concentration of inexhaustible knowledge and liberation illumines them, they attain omniscience.

source_sentence: 為金剛輪陀羅尼光明照故，得清淨境界智慧聚三昧光明；
translation: Because they are illumined by the light of the diamond-wheel dhāraṇī, they attain the light of concentration on the aggregate of knowledge and wisdom of the pure realm.

source_sentence: 為普門際境界莊嚴藏般若波羅蜜光明照故，得佛圓滿虛空藏三昧光明；
translation: Because of the illumination of the light of the store of adornments of transcendent wisdom of the boundless realm of omniscience, they attain the light of the space-store concentration of the consummation of buddhahood.

source_sentence: 為一切佛戒、定、慧、法輪三昧光明照故，得三世無盡圓滿智三昧光明。
translation: Because all the buddhas of precepts, concentration, wisdom, and the Dharma-wheel samādhi shine brightly, they attain the light of the samādhi of the inexhaustible perfect knowledge of the three times.

source_sentence: 時，彼仙人放善財手，善財童子即自見身還在本處。
translation: That sage then released his hand to Sudhana, and Sudhana saw that he was still alive.

source_sentence: 仙人告言：「善男子！
translation: The sage told him, Good man!

source_sentence: 汝憶念耶？」
translation: Do you remember it?

source_sentence: 善財言：「唯此是聖者善知識力，令我憶念分明顯現。」
translation: Sun Cai said, Only this is the power of the noble person's good knowledge that causes my recollection to clearly appear.

source_sentence: 仙人告言：「善男子！
translation: The sage told him, Good man!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩無勝幢解脫門，如諸菩薩摩訶薩成就一切殊勝三昧，於一切時而得自在；
translation: “I only know this liberation of enlightening beings called ‘unsurpassed Banner.’ Just as the great enlightening beings accomplish all kinds of supreme concentration and attain mastery at all times, so do I also know this liberation of enlightening beings called ‘unsurpassed Banner.’

source_sentence: 於一念頃出生諸佛無量智慧微妙境界；
translation: In an instant of thought a subtle sphere of infinite knowledge and wisdom of buddhas emerges.

source_sentence: 以佛智慧而為莊嚴，普照世間無有障礙；
translation: They are adorned by the knowledge of buddhas, illumining all worlds without obstruction.

source_sentence: 一念普入三世境界，分形遍往十方剎海，智身普入一切法界，隨眾生心普現其前，
translation: In a single thought he entered into all realms of past, present, and future in the ocean of worlds of the ten directions; his body of knowledge entered into all realms of reality, appearing to sentient beings according to their mentalities.

source_sentence: 放淨光明令其愛樂，觀其根行而為利益，而我云何能知、能說彼功德行、彼殊勝願、彼莊嚴剎、彼智境界、彼三昧所行、彼神通變化、彼解脫遊戲、彼身相差別、彼音聲清淨、彼智慧光明、彼三世境界、彼色身遍往、彼智身普照、彼隨樂普現、彼隨時饒益、彼隨俗軌儀、彼圓音所說、彼清淨妙行、彼光網所照？
translation: How can I know or tell of their virtuous practices, their superior vows, their adornments, their buddha-lands, their spheres of knowledge, what they practice in concentration, their supernormal powers, their mystic displays, their liberations, their freedoms, the differences in bodily characteristics, the purity of their voices, the light of their knowledge, the

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於此南方有一聚落，名伊沙那；
translation: To the south of here there is a village called Īṣāna.

source_sentence: 彼有住處名阿野怛那，有婆羅門名曰勝熱。
translation: There's a dwelling place there named Anavatapta, and there's a Brāhmaṇa named Vaiśravaṇa.

source_sentence: 汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行，修菩薩道。」
translation: Go there and ask the bodhisattva how to train in the bodhisattva practice and cultivate the bodhisattva path.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子歡喜踊躍，生愛敬心，頂禮其足，遶無數匝，慇懃瞻仰，
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the brahmin Supratishthita and went up to see him. The brahmin Supratiṣṭhita was delighted, jumped for joy, and danced in admiration. With affection and respect, he bowed at Supratiṣṭhita’s feet and circled him countless times.

source_sentence: 辭退南行。
translation: He withdrew and traveled south.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子為菩薩無勝幢解脫門，光明照其心故，得住諸佛不思議境界種種神通力，
translation: Then Sudhana entered the door of liberation of enlightening beings’ inconceivable liberation called “unsurpassed Banner,” whereby he attained the sphere of unfathomable knowledge of buddhas.

source_sentence: 證菩薩不思議解脫種種神通智，得菩薩不思議三昧智光明，得一切時恒熏習三昧智光明，
translation: They realize the various spiritual knowledges of enlightening beings’ inconceivable liberation, and attain the light of knowledge of concentration of enlightening beings’ inconceivability. They attain the light of knowledge always permeating concentration at all times.

source_sentence: 得遍了知一切境界皆依想所住三昧智光明，得入一切世間具足殊勝智光明，
translation: “Great enlightening beings attain the light of knowledge that pervades all realms, which are based on ideation and conception; they attain the light of knowledge that enters into all worlds and is replete with supreme knowledge.

source_sentence: 以得如是智光明故，於一切處皆隨現身，隨一一身以究竟智，皆悉演說究竟平等、無二、無別、無分別法，
translation: Because they had attained the light of knowledge like this, they manifested bodies in all places. In each and every body with their ultimate knowledge, they all expounded the ultimate equality, nonduality, non distinction, and nondiscriminating principles.

source_sentence: 以明淨智普照境界，凡所聽聞甚深解脫，清淨法藏皆能忍受，信解清淨決定明了，
translation: They can tolerate and endure the pure treasury of truth; their faith, understanding, purity, certainty, clarity, and comprehension are enlightened.

source_sentence: 諸法自性無有疑惑，心恒不捨修習一切菩薩妙行，勇猛精進，趣一切智無有退轉；
translation: The essential nature of all things has no doubt or confusion. Their minds never give up cultivating the subtle practices of enlightening beings; boldly and energetically striving, they proceed to omniscience without turning back.

source_sentence: 獲得十力差別智光，愛樂深法常無厭足；
translation: They attain the light of knowledge of the differentiations of the ten powers, always delighting in profound teachings.

source_sentence: 以正修行住一切智，其心正向，入佛境界，出生菩薩廣大莊嚴，圓滿無邊清淨大願，
translation: By correctly cultivating practice they abide in omniscience, their minds rightly directed toward the sphere of buddhahood; entering the sphere of buddhahood, they produce great adornment for enlightening beings, fulfilling boundless pure vows.

source_sentence: 以無障礙智知無邊世界網，以無懈怠心度無邊眾生海，普遍了達無邊菩薩諸行境界，
translation: Knowing the network of boundless worlds by unobstructed knowledge, they liberate endless oceans of sentient beings with minds free from laziness. They universally perceive the boundless realm of enlightening beings’ practices.

source_sentence: 普見無邊一切世界種種差別，普入無邊廣狹麁妙一切世界，普知無邊一切世界種種想網，
translation: They see the various differences of all worlds without bound, enter all worlds with boundless distinctions, and know the various networks of conceptions of all worlds.

source_sentence: 普知無邊一切世界諸安立諦，普了無邊一切世界言辭稱讚，普知無邊一切眾生種種信解，
translation: Knowing the boundless truths of all worlds, comprehending the words and praises of all worlds, they know the various faiths and understandings of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 普知無邊一切眾生成熟時節，普知無邊一切眾生種種心想，普見無邊一切眾生種種色相，
translation: They know the time and seasons of all sentient beings’ development; they know the various mentalities and thoughts of all sentient beings without bound, and they see the various forms and characteristics of all sentient beings without bound.

source_sentence: 隨其所應方便成熟。
translation: They are ripened according to their skillful means.

source_sentence: 念善知識，漸次遊行至伊沙那聚落，見勝熱婆羅門，修諸苦行於赫日中，
translation: Mindful of his good friend, he gradually traveled to the village of Īṣāna and saw a brahman who was practicing austerities in the middle of the heat.

source_sentence: 四面火聚猶如大山，中有刀山高峻無極，為欲勤求一切智智，登彼刀山投身入火。
translation: The four sides of the fire cluster are like a great mountain in which there's a mountain of swords that's so high and limitless, and because they want to diligently pursue omniscience, they climb up that mountain of swords and throw themselves into the fire.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子既至其所，頂禮其足，合掌而立，白言：「聖者！
translation: Then Sudhana went up to him, paid his respects, and said:

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何學菩薩行，云何修菩薩道，
translation: I have set my mind on unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, but I do not know how an enlightening being is to learn and carry out the practice of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 我聞聖者善能誘誨，願為我說。」
translation: I've heard that the noble one is good at encouraging, so please tell me about it.

source_sentence: 婆羅門言：「善男子！
translation: The Brāhmaṇa said, Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今若能登此刀山，投身火聚，諸菩薩行悉得清淨。」
translation: If you can now ascend this mountain of swords and throw yourself into a cluster of fire, the bodhisattvas' actions will all become pure.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子作如是念：「得人身難，離諸難難，得無難難，離惡法難，
translation: “Thereupon, Sudhana thought to himself, “I have attained the state of neither hardship nor difficulty. I am free of all difficulties and difficulties, without any difficulty or difficulty, in which there is no difficulty whatsoever; I am free of all evil deeds that are harmful to me.” Then Sudhana said:

source_sentence: 得淨法難，遇佛出世難，具足諸根難，得聞正法難，得遇善人難，逢真善知識難，
translation: The difficulty of attaining the pure teaching, the difficulty of encountering buddhas who appear in the world, the difficulty of being endowed with faculties, the difficulty of hearing the true teaching, the difficulty of encountering good people, and the difficulty of meeting true teachers.

source_sentence: 受如理正教難，得正命自活難，得隨法修行難，此將非魔魔所使耶？
translation: Wouldn't this be the result of Māra and Māra's demonic tendencies that make it difficult to receive correct teachings according to principles, attain right livelihood by themselves, and cultivate practice according to the teachings?

source_sentence: 將非是魔險、惡徒黨詐現菩薩善知識相，與諸菩薩而作怨敵，而欲為我作善根難、作壽命難、作梵行難，
translation: It will not be the case that Māra, dangerous and evildoers deceitfully show the bodhisattva the characteristics of a good friend. They will become enemies to the bodhisattvas and want to make it difficult for me to cultivate roots of virtue, life, and practice of austerity.

source_sentence: 障我修行一切智道，牽我令入邪惡趣中，障我所證解脫法門，障我所求無上佛法。」
translation: They hinder me from cultivating the path of omniscience, lead me into wrong and bad destinies, hinder the liberation dharma-gate that I've realized, and hinder the unsurpassed buddha-dharma that I seek.

source_sentence: 作是念時，十千梵天住虛空中，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: When he had this thought, 10,000 Brahmā gods stayed in the sky and said, Good man!

source_sentence: 莫作是念，莫作是念；
translation: Don’t think like this; don’t think like that.

source_sentence: 今此聖者得金剛焰三昧光明，發大精進勇猛不退，誓入生死度諸眾生，
translation: “Now this holy one has attained the light of the concentration called ‘samādhi of adamantine flame.’ Arousing great energy and courage, he does not regress. He undertakes to enter birth and death in order to save all living beings.

source_sentence: 欲竭一切諸貪欲海，欲截一切諸邪見網，欲燒一切諸煩惱薪，欲普運度諸險難磧，
translation: They want to extinguish all the oceans of craving, they want to cut off all the webs of wrong views, they want to burn the firewood of all afflictions, and they want to ferry them everywhere through the dangerous deserts.

source_sentence: 欲盡除斷老病死怖，欲盡吹壞無明障山，欲普引導出惑稠林，欲放一切妙法光明普照三世愚癡黑闇。
translation: They want to extinguish the fear of old age, sickness, and death, want to completely blow up the mountain of the ignorance hindrances, want to guide all out of the thicket of afflictions, and want to radiate the light of all the wonderful dharmas that universally illuminate the darkness of folly in the three worlds.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我諸梵天執著邪見；
translation: The Brahmā gods and humans hold to a false view of self.

source_sentence: 皆悉自謂是自在者，是能作者，我為一切世間最勝。
translation: They all claim to be self-contained, which is the author who can do it, and I am the most superior of all the worlds.

source_sentence: 此婆羅門，五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman burned his body in five kinds of scorching fire.

source_sentence: 時，其火光明照我宮殿，我即開悟，於自所居及諸禪定心無樂著，皆共來詣婆羅門所；
translation: The light of that fire illumined my palace. I immediately awakened and, having no desire or attachment for where I lived or for my meditations, came together to the brahman’s place.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門以神通力即為我等現大苦行，令我滅除一切邪見，為我說法令我斷除一切憍慢，
translation: Then the brāhmaṇa manifested great austerities for us by means of his supernormal powers, causing us to abandon all wrong views and teaching us so that we would be freed from all conceit.

source_sentence: 普為一切世間眾生住於大慈行，於大悲起廣大心，發菩提意，住堅固願，
translation: “Great enlightening beings practice great benevolence for the sake of all sentient beings in all worlds. With great compassion they develop great determination, give rise to great compassion, and aspire to enlightenment. They live by firmly vowing:

source_sentence: 欣求解脫，常見諸佛，恒聞妙法；
translation: Delighted to seek liberation, they see all buddhas and always hear the sublime Teaching.

source_sentence: 於一切處，心無所著，能轉一切圓滿法輪，其聲無礙普遍一切。」
translation: In all places, his mind has no attachments, and he can turn the wheel of the Dharma that fulfills all things, with unobstructed sound pervading everywhere.

source_sentence: 復有十千諸魔天眾住虛空中，以天摩尼寶散婆羅門上，告善財言：「善男子！
translation: Again, there were 10,000 Māra gods in the sky who scattered celestial jewels over the Brāhmaṇa and told him, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，其火光明映奪我等所有宮殿，及身瓔珞諸莊嚴具，一切光明皆如聚墨，
translation: The light of that fire shone upon all our palaces, as well as the adornments on our bodies and jewelry. All their rays of light were like clouds of black ink.

source_sentence: 令我於中不生樂著，我與眷屬來詣其所。
translation: They cause me not to become attached to pleasure in them, and I and my retinue come to them.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我說法，令我及餘無量天子、諸天女等，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得不退轉。」
translation: The Brāhmaṇa then taught me the Dharma so that I and the other innumerable gods and goddesses would attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment without regressing.

source_sentence: 復有十千他化天王於虛空中各散天華，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: Ten thousand other celestial kings scattered heavenly flowers in the sky and said, Good sons!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，其火光明映奪於我所有宮殿、瓔珞、嚴具，一切光明皆如聚墨，令我於中不生愛著，
translation: The light of that fire shone upon my palaces, jewelry, and other adornments. All the rays of light were like clouds of black ink, enabling me not to cling to them.

source_sentence: 即與眷屬來詣其所。
translation: He then came to them with his retinue.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我說法，令我身心而得自在，於煩惱中而得自在，於受生中而得自在，
translation: The brāhmaṇa then taught me the Dharma, enabling me to attain mastery over my body and mind. Having attained mastery over defilements, he also attained mastery over birth.

source_sentence: 於壽命中而得自在，於業障中而得自在，於諸三昧而得自在，於莊嚴具而得自在，
translation: They attain mastery over life, mastery over the hindrances of action, mastery over all concentrations, and mastery over adornments.

source_sentence: 於菩提心而得自在，乃至能於一切佛法而得自在。」
translation: They attain mastery over the mind of enlightenment and are able to attain mastery over all the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 復有十千化樂天王住虛空中作天音樂，以美妙聲恭敬供養，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: Ten thousand other celestial kings of the Nirmāṇarati gods also stood in space and played heavenly music, offering support and respect with beautiful sounds, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，其火光明照我宮殿、諸莊嚴具，所有光明隱蔽不現，能令我身及諸采女於五欲中不生愛著、不受欲樂、身心柔軟，
translation: The light of that fire illumined my palace and all the adornments. All the rays of light were concealed from me, enabling me and the nymphs to be neither attached to pleasures nor attached to pleasures in the realm of desire; their bodies and minds were as soft and gentle as a buddha’s body.

source_sentence: 即與眷屬來詣其所。
translation: He then came to them with his retinue.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我說法，能令我等心得清淨，心得明潔，心得堪能，心得純善，
translation: The brāhmaṇa explained the Dharma to me, enabling us to attain purity of mind, clarity and genuineness of mind, intelligence and capability of mind, pure and genuine insight of mind.

source_sentence: 心極柔軟，心生歡喜，乃至令得具足十力清淨智身，出生無量清淨色身，
translation: Their minds were extremely flexible, and their hearts rejoiced. They attain the pure body of knowledge endowed with the ten powers, producing an immeasurable body of pure form.

source_sentence: 演出無量清淨言辭，出生無量如來音聲，悟入無量如來之心，具足獲得一切智智。」
translation: He produces measureless pure words, produces measureless sounds of the Tathāgata's voice, awakens to the mind of measureless tathāgatas, and fully attains omniscience.

source_sentence: 復有十千兜率天王、天子、天女、無量眷屬於虛空中，起諸香雲，雨眾妙香，
translation: Ten thousand heavenly kings of the Tushita heavens, their celestial beings and goddesses, with countless attendants in the sky, produced clouds of fragrant clouds that showered all kinds of exquisite fragrances.

source_sentence: 恭敬供養，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: They paid homage and made offerings, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，光照我宮，令我諸天及其眷屬，於自宮殿不生愛著，不貪欲樂，來詣其所。
translation: At the time, that light shone in my palace, causing our gods and their retinues to come to their own palace without craving or desire for it.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我說法，能令我等斷除一切五欲愛著，小欲知足心生歡喜，
translation: At that time, the brahman preached the Dharma to me, enabling us to abandon all desires and attachments of the five senses. Being content with few desires, we were delighted.

source_sentence: 心得充滿，生諸善根發菩提心，乃至圓滿一切佛法。」
translation: Their minds are filled with good roots that give rise to the mind of enlightenment, up to the point where they fulfill all the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 復有十千夜摩天王并其眷屬、天子、天女前後圍遶於虛空中，以天曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、拘蘇摩華，
translation: Ten thousand heavenly kings of the Yama heavens surrounded the sky with their retinues, celestial beings and goddesses in front and behind them, adorned with heavenly māndārava flowers, mahāmandārava flowers, and Kusuma flowers.

source_sentence: 散婆羅門上，恭敬供養，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: They scattered the offerings to the brāhmaṇa and offered them in respect, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，光照我宮，能令我等集會之時，於天音樂不生貪著，亦不愛樂己身、眷屬，
translation: At the time, that light shone brightly in my palace, enabling us not to become attached to celestial music or delight in our own bodies or those of their followers when we assembled.

source_sentence: 來詣其所，聞其說法，於諸欲樂，悉生捨離，迴向、趣求一切佛法。」
translation: They come to him, hear his teaching, abandon all their desires and pleasures, dedicate themselves back to and seek all the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 復有十千三十三天帝釋諸王并其眷屬、天子、天女前後圍遶於虛空中，
translation: Again, there were ten thousand Indras of the thirty-three-fold heavenly realm in the sky, surrounded by their kings, their retinues, celestial beings, and goddesses.

source_sentence: 雨天衣服、眾寶瓔珞、天莊嚴具、拘蘇摩華，恭敬供養，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: They rained heavenly clothing, jewelry of various treasures, celestial adornments, and kośumāra flowers to honor and make offerings, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，光照我宮，令我天眾於其宮殿，殊勝集會，遊戲園林，天諸音樂，
translation: At that time the light illumined my palace, enabling us gods to assemble in its palace and assembly hall.

source_sentence: 娛樂之處，不生愛樂，即與眷屬來詣其所。
translation: Where they're entertained, they don't give rise to desire or pleasure, so they come and go with their retinues.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我等說一切諸法皆悉無常，遷流、變動、敗壞、磨滅，令我斷除憍慢、放逸，
translation: “Then the brāhmaṇa explained to us, ‘All things are impermanent. They change, disintegrate, decay, and perish.’ Enabling us to rid ourselves of our arrogance and self-indulgence, he said:

source_sentence: 令我愛樂無上菩提。
translation: It causes me to delight in unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我當見此婆羅門；
translation: I will see this brahman.

source_sentence: 時，須彌山頂六種震動，我等諸天見是相已，極生恐怖厭離之心，即時發起阿耨多羅三藐三菩提意，
translation: At that time the top of Mount Sumeru shook in six ways. Seeing these signs, we gods became greatly frightened and disgusted, and immediately set our minds on unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 咸願趣求一切智智。」
translation: They all wish to pursue omniscience and cognition.

source_sentence: ◎◎復有十千諸大龍王，所謂：伊羅鉢那龍王、難陀龍王、優婆難陀龍王等，
translation: â€œThere were also 10,000 great dragon kings, called Elāpatna-nāga-rāja, Nanda-nāga-rāja, Upananda-nāga-rāja and so forth.

source_sentence: 於虛空中布大香雲，普雨無量隨時栴檀微細香雨，無數龍女奏天音樂，
translation: In the sky was spread a great cloud of fragrance, showering rain in all directions, and countless goddesses played celestial music.

source_sentence: 雨天妙華及天香水，恭敬供養，作如是言：「善男子！
translation: They rained down heavenly flowers and perfumes, offered respect and offerings, and said, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，其火光明照我宮殿，令諸龍眾離熱沙怖，金翅鳥怖，除滅瞋恚身得清涼，
translation: The light of that fire then shone brightly on my palace, freeing the dragons from the fear of scorching sand and the garuḍas from the fear of gold-winged birds. They were rid of their anger and gained clarity and coolness.

source_sentence: 心無垢濁泰然安隱，復為我等如應說法、聞法、信解、厭惡龍趣、發至誠心悔除一切諸惡業障，
translation: “Furthermore, you should teach us the Dharma as it should be taught, hear the Dharma, believe and understand it, become disgusted with the evil destinies of nāga kingdoms, and give rise to sincere repentance to remove all the bad karmic hindrances.

source_sentence: 乃至發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，究竟安住一切智智。」
translation: He then gives rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and ultimately abides in omniscience.

source_sentence: 復有十千諸夜叉王於虛空中，各以種種上妙供具，恭敬供養，此婆羅門及以善財，
translation: Ten thousand other yaksha kings also flew in the sky, each offering various kinds of exquisite offerings to the brahman and Sudhana.

source_sentence: 作如是言：「善男子！
translation: He said, Good man!

source_sentence: 此婆羅門五熱炙身；
translation: This brahman’s body is scorched by the five kinds of heat.

source_sentence: 時，能令我等及諸眷屬，悉於眾生發慈愍心，一切羅剎、鳩槃茶等，亦生慈心，
translation: At the time, he was able to cause us and our retinues to all become compassionate toward sentient beings, and all the rāṣas, kumbhāṇḍas, and so forth, also became compassionate.

source_sentence: 以慈心故，於諸眾生無所惱害，能施安樂，各與眷屬俱來見我，我及彼等即共來詣婆羅門所。
translation: Because of their minds of kindness, they don't harm sentient beings and can give them peace and comfort, so each comes along with his retinue to see me, and I and they all come together to the Brāhmaṇa.

source_sentence: 時，婆羅門為我說法，能令我等一切皆得身心安樂，增長威力；
translation: At that time the brahman preached the Dharma to me, enabling us all to attain physical and mental peace and increase in strength.

source_sentence: 又令無量夜叉、羅剎、鳩槃茶等，發於無上菩提之心。」
translation: It also causes measureless yakṣas, rājas, kumbhāṇḍas, and so forth to give rise to the mind of unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: ◎大方廣佛華嚴經卷第八
translation: Dafangguang fo huayan jing, vol. 8
